sourcesContent: import React, { Component } from "react" export default class PreviewComponent extends Component { state = { name: "", ingridents: "", desc: "", type: "", process: [] } saveSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() const newFood = { name: this.state.name, ingridents:this.state.ingridents, desc : this.state.desc, type:this.state.type, process :this.state } } onChangeHandaler = e => { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } render() { return (
